title: crest of honor gone
body: I worked hard for my green crest of honor but it has gone. I didn't get an e-mail saying I was punished for something nor has the amount I've been honored changed. I'm a little sad it's gone. Is there a way I can re-earn it? doesn't seem like many ppl honor anymore :(

replies.body: The only way to re-earn a crest is by other players honouring you. These crests decay overtime and will eventually be lost if you aren't honoured enough recently.
but I'm honored almost after every game...this is why I'm a bit confused.

plus, consider that sometimes it takes a while to let them pop up again after one crest decayed.

It happened to me for a whole month in this eason for example.

suggestion: don' t work hard for the boon. just let it happen :)

It depends on what you're honoured for and your crest. If you had the "Great Teammate" crest but you were honoured more for "Honourable Opponent" or "Friendly" then you'd lose the "Great Teammate" crest but you'll be awarded with another one should you receive enough of the required Honour points.
I had the green one, I thought that was a multi? either way, I don't have one at all :(. oh well. Thanks for your help. I hope I can get it back

The green one is "Great Teammate" unless you're referring to the Aqua one which is "Great Mentor". 

Teamwork, Friendship and Helpful Honours do contribute to "Great Teammate", "Great Mentor" and "Great Leader" crests but certain honours carry a heavier weight than others. For example, Teamwork honours would carry a heavier weight in the "Great Teammate" creast than Helpful honours.

Rineyy provided some solid information here!  Honor ribbons remain for a limited amount of time, but they can be obtained again!  Check out our [Honor System FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751854-Honor-System-FAQ#h3q1) that should add some additional clarity.  Hope that helps!
